Info.Title: Animal
Info.Genre: Action, Adventure, Drama, Horror, Mystery, Sci-Fi, Thriller
Info.Actors: Joey Lauren Adams, Elizabeth Gillies, Paul Iacono, Thorsten Kaye
Info.Plot: When plans for a weekend vacation hit a dead end, a group of close-knit friends find themselves stranded in unfamiliar territory, pursued by a menacing, blood thirsty predator.
